register.description: This register contains the IP revision code for the CM_CORE_AON part of the PRCM
This register manages the CM_CORE_AON_PROFILING clock. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is performing transition: wakeup, or sleep, or sleep abortion

bitfield.description: Control the way mandatory clocks are managed.

bitenum.description: Module is disabled by SW. OCP configuration port is not accessible.
Module is managed automatically by HW along with CM_CORE_AON and EMU domain. OCP configuration port is accessible only when EMU domain is on.

register.description: This register is used to monitor the CM_COREAON's 32 bit HEDEBUG BUS [warm reset insensitive]

This register is used to configure the CM_CORE_AON's 32-bit debug output. There is one 7-bit source select field for selecting from a shared set of 8-bit internal signal blocks per byte. The signals included in each block are specified in the PRCM integration specification. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Internal signal block select for debug word byte-0

register.description: This register is used to configure the CM_CORE_AON's 32-bit debug output. There is one 7-bit source select field for selecting from a shared set of 8-bit internal signal blocks per byte. The signals included in each block are specified in the PRCM integration specification. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Internal signal block select for debug word byte-1

register.description: This register is used to configure the CM_CORE_AON's 32-bit debug output. There is one 7-bit source select field for selecting from a shared set of 8-bit internal signal blocks per byte. The signals included in each block are specified in the PRCM integration specification. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Internal signal block select for debug word byte-2

There is one 7-bit source select field for selecting from a shared set of 8-bit internal signal blocks per byte.
